## ğŸ”— ACCESS COMPLETE SCRIPTS

**ALL complete, production-ready C# scripts are available in the Gemini AI conversation:**

ğŸ‘‰ **Gemini Session:** https://gemini.google.com/app/824a4b718d6a7faf

**The conversation contains:**
- âœ… Complete C# code for all 20+ scripts

---

## ğŸš€ QUICK START GUIDE

### Step 1: Get the Scripts
1. Open the Gemini conversation link above
2. Scroll through to find each script (they're clearly labeled)
3. Copy each script into your Unity project

### Step 2: Create Folder Structure
In Unity:
1. Right-click in Project window â†’ Create â†’ Folder
2. Create the folder structure shown above
3. Create C# scripts in each folder

### Step 3: Paste Code
1. Double-click each new C# script
2. Delete default code
3. Paste the code from Gemini conversation
4. Save (Ctrl+S)

### Step 4: Attach Scripts
1. **GameManager:** Create empty GameObject "_GameSystem"
2. **Player Scripts:** Attach to Player/Camera
3. **NPC Scripts:** Attach to NPC models
4. **VIVERSE Scripts:** Attach as per VIVERSE SDK documentation

---

## ğŸ“‹ SCRIPT MANIFEST

### Core AI Systems
| Script | Purpose | Lines | Location |
|--------|---------|-------|----------|
| PsychologicalProfile.cs | Tracks player behavior and dialogue | ~150 | Assets/Scripts/AI/ |
| ManipulationEngine.cs | Generates AI taunts based on memories | ~200 | Assets/Scripts/AI/ |
| AIController.cs | Handles API communication with LLM | ~100 | Assets/Scripts/AI/ |

### VIVERSE Integration
| Script | Purpose | Lines | Location |
|--------|---------|-------|----------|
| VIVERSEAvatarController.cs | Avatar movement and interactions | ~180 | Assets/Scripts/VIVERSE/ |
| VIVERSESceneManager.cs | Scene loading for VIVERSE | ~120 | Assets/Scripts/VIVERSE/ |
| VIVERSEInputHandler.cs | VR/Desktop input handling | ~150 | Assets/Scripts/VIVERSE/ |

### World Systems
| Script | Purpose | Lines | Location |
|--------|---------|-------|----------|
| LocationManager.cs | Manages 8 game locations | ~250 | Assets/Scripts/World/ |
| FastTravelSystem.cs | Fast travel UI and logic | ~100 | Assets/Scripts/World/ |
| DynamicEventManager.cs | Random encounters | ~180 | Assets/Scripts/World/ |

### Narrative Systems
| Script | Purpose | Lines | Location |
|--------|---------|-------|----------|
| EndingManager.cs | Tracks 3 ending paths | ~200 | Assets/Scripts/Narrative/ |
| MoralityTracker.cs | Tracks player choices | ~150 | Assets/Scripts/Narrative/ |
| QuestManager.cs | Quest system with 5 quests | ~300 | Assets/Scripts/Narrative/ |

### NPC Systems  
| Script | Purpose | Lines | Location |
|--------|---------|-------|----------|
| NPCBrain.cs | AI personality system | ~80 | Assets/Scripts/NPCs/ |
| NPCInteraction.cs | Player-NPC conversations | ~100 | Assets/Scripts/NPCs/ |
| SarahController.cs | Ghost NPC behavior | ~200 | Assets/Scripts/NPCs/ |
| NexusTerminal.cs | Ship AI terminal | ~150 | Assets/Scripts/NPCs/ |

### Gameplay Mechanics
| Script | Purpose | Lines | Location |
|--------|---------|-------|----------|
| StealthManager.cs | Line-of-sight hiding | ~80 | Assets/Scripts/Gameplay/ |
| FlashlightController.cs | UV flashlight weapon | ~120 | Assets/Scripts/Gameplay/ |
| FearManager.cs | Dynamic fear system | ~250 | Assets/Scripts/Gameplay/ |
| GameManager.cs | Central game controller | ~300 | Assets/Scripts/Gameplay/ |
| AlienMovement.cs | Xyloth AI pathfinding | ~200 | Assets/Scripts/Movement/ |

## ğŸ¯ INTEGRATION NOTES

### API Keys Required
```csharp
// In AIController.cs, replace:
private string apiKey = "YOUR_API_KEY_HERE";

// Get API key from:
// - Perplexity: https://www.perplexity.ai/settings/api
// - OpenAI: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
```

### VIVERSE SDK Setup
1. Download VIVERSE SDK from Unity Asset Store
2. Import into project
3. Follow VIVERSE documentation for initial setup
4. Our scripts are already compatible!

### Unity Version
- **Recommended:** Unity 2021 LTS or 2022 LTS
- **Minimum:** Unity 2020.3
- **VIVERSE:** Check VIVERSE docs for latest requirements
